title: Why EBITDA is Lying to You
summary: Understanding the gap between accounting profits and real cash flow in SaaS businesses.
content: EBITDA is a useful metric, but it removes the very things that kill growing businesses: Working Capital and CapEx.

title: Structuring Deals in High Interest Rate Environments
summary: Debt is no longer cheap. How to structure LBOs when the cost of capital hits 8%.
content: When the risk-free rate is 5%, your hurdle rate isn't 10% anymoreâit's 15% or 20%. This changes the leverage math entirely.
